get.description: This endpoint retrieves comprehensive information about a single actor. You must specify the actor's unique identifier, `ActorID`, in the request path to obtain their full profile, including attributes.

parameters.name: ActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose details are to be retrieved.

200.description: Actor details retrieved successfully.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing actor (operator or sub-operator) identified by `ActorID`. The request body must contain the updated attributes for the actor.

parameters.name: ActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor to be updated.

200.description: Actor updated successfully.

get.description: Retrieves the details of an actor using their unique `ActorCode`. This is useful for fetching information about a specific actor when only their code is known.

parameters.name: ActorCode
parameters.description: The unique code assigned to the actor. This code is used to identify and retrieve the actor's details.

200.description: Actor details retrieved successfully.

post.description: Creates a new actor under the specified parent actor. The parent actor is identified by the `ParentActorID` provided in the path. The request body must contain the details of the new actor.

parameters.name: ParentActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parent actor under which the new actor will be created.

200.description: Actor created successfully.

post.description: Creates a new actor under the specified parent actor. The parent actor is identified by the `ParentActorID` provided in the path. The request body must contain the details of the new actor.

parameters.name: ParentActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parent actor under which the new actor will be created.

200.description: Actor created successfully.

get.description: Retrieves a list of payment methods associated with a specific actor, identified by the `ActorID`.

parameters.name: ActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose payment methods are being requested.

200.description: A list of payment methods associated with the actor was retrieved successfully.

put.description: Updates the payment methods associated with a specific actor, identified by the `ActorID`.

parameters.name: ActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose payment methods are being updated.

requestBody.description: The payment methods to be updated.

post.description: Creates new payment methods for a specific actor, identified by the `ActorID`.

parameters.name: ActorID

requestBody.description: The payment methods to be created

delete.description: Deletes a specific payment method associated with a given actor, identified by `ActorID` and `paymentMethodID`.

parameters.name: ActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose payment method is being deleted.

parameters.name: paymentMethodID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment method to be deleted.

200.description: The payment method was deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieves the EV meter dashboard for a specific operator, identified by `ActorID`. Optional query parameters allow filtering by date range, machine ID, time period, and machine number.

parameters.name: ActorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor (operator) for whom the EV meter dashboard is being retrieved.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The start date for filtering the EV meter dashboard data.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end date for filtering the EV meter dashboard data.

parameters.name: MachineID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the machine for which the EV meter data is being retrieved.

parameters.name: TimePeriod
parameters.description: The time period for which the EV meter data is being retrieved.

parameters.name: MachineNumber
parameters.description: The number of the machine for which the EV meter data is being retrieved.

parameters.name: actorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor for whom encryption keys are being retrieved.

parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier of an actor to retrieve its hierarchy instead of the current user's hierarchy.

parameters.name: StatusID
parameters.description: Filter the hierarchy to only include actors with a specific status identifier.

parameters.name: HierarchyLevelLimit
parameters.description: The maximum number of hierarchy levels to retrieve.

200.description: The actor hierarchy was retrieved successfully.

parameters.name: actorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor for whom the encryption key is being generated.

parameters.name: actorID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose message is being decrypted.

parameters.name: encVer
parameters.description: The version of the encryption used to decrypt the message.

requestBody.description: The encrypted message to be decrypted.

200.description: The message was decrypted successfully.
